video_title: What is the next best step? #shorts #mindset #positivity
transcript:
one of my favorite quotes is that the
Journey of a Thousand Miles begins with
a single step one of the things that I
found after coaching tens of thousands
of people that holds them back the most
is they start thinking about mile
487 instead of looking down at their
feet and ask themselves the question
what is the next best step that I need
to take and so if you're out there and
you're struggling just remember this you
don't have to take all the steps at once
just take the next best step for your
future
